post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Q. Tell me about your most recent/great project you've completed?
A. Every project was so valuable to me and I was the key person.
** Avoid the clumsy expression. This question is actually very easy one once you prepare. Focus on what the company looks for within my specialty. Pick the closest one they must become interested. At least the role/responsibility you'd taken at then should be similar or same as what is looked for.
post.title: How to fail a job interview (2) about your most recent work
